com.facebook.react.views.text

Class ReactTextAnchorViewManager<T extends android.view.View,C extends ReactBaseTextShadowNode>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.react.bridge.BaseJavaModule
      • com.facebook.react.uimanager.ViewManager<T,C>
        • com.facebook.react.uimanager.BaseViewManager<T,C>
          • com.facebook.react.views.text.ReactTextAnchorViewManager<T,C>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NativeModule
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ReactTextViewManager

    public abstract class ReactTextAnchorViewManager<T extends android.view.View,C extends ReactBaseTextShadowNode>
extends BaseViewManager<T,C>
    Abstract class for anchor <Text>-ish spannable views, such as TextView or TextEdit.

    This is a "shadowing" view manager, which means that the NativeViewHierarchyManager will NOT manage children of native TextView instances instanciated by this manager. Instead we use @{link ReactBaseTextShadowNode} hierarchy to calculate a Spannable text represented the whole text subtree.
